column4: Anyone know how to make the CHROME browser launch from Evolution?

what does "System>Preferences>Default" launch?  I am using Kubuntu and I dont think my menu is set up that way.  in settings>system settings>default applications, Google-Chrome is already the default.  I think that there is another set of associations for Gnome programs
I'm on netbook remix and I guessed the menu path ;) but if chrome is already set as the default I'd say you're right, there must be another set of settings. Cant help you there sorry :(
